org.eclipse.keyple.core.card.command

Class AbstractApduCommandBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.keyple.core.card.command.AbstractApduCommandBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractIso7816CommandBuilder

    public abstract class AbstractApduCommandBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic APDU command builder.

    It provides the generic getters to retrieve:

    • the card command reference,
    • the name of the command,
    • the built APDURequest,
    • the corresponding AbstractApduResponseParser class.
    Since:
    0.9

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected CardCommand commandRef
      The reference field CardCommand is used to find the type of command concerned when manipulating a list of abstract builder objects.
      protected ApduRequest request
      The byte array APDU request.

    • Field Detail

      • commandRef

        protected final CardCommand commandRef
        The reference field CardCommand is used to find the type of command concerned when manipulating a list of abstract builder objects. Unfortunately, the diversity of these objects does not allow the use of simple generic methods.
        Since:
        0.9

      • request

        protected ApduRequest request
        The byte array APDU request.
        Since:
        0.9

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractApduCommandBuilder

        protected AbstractApduCommandBuilder(CardCommand commandRef,
                                     ApduRequest request)
        (protected)
        The generic abstract constructor to build an APDU request with a command reference and a byte array.
        Parameters:
        commandRef - command reference (should not be null)
        request - request
        Since:
        0.9

    • Method Detail

      • addSubName

        public final void addSubName(java.lang.String subName)
        Appends a string to the current name.

        The subname completes the name of the current command. This method must therefore only be called conditionally (log level >= debug).

        Parameters:
        subName - the string to append
        Since:
        0.9

      • getCommandRef

        public CardCommand getCommandRef()
        Gets CardCommand the current command identification
        Returns:
        A non null reference
        Since:
        0.9

      • getName

        public final java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the name of this APDU command if it has been allowed by the log level (see constructor).
        Returns:
        A String (may be null).
        Since:
        0.9

      • getApduRequest

        public final ApduRequest getApduRequest()
        Gets ApduRequest the request
        Returns:
        A nullable reference
        Since:
        0.9
